products.productModel: FALLS ROADMASTER IV STEEL BELTED RADIAL

summary: TL* THE CONTACT OWNS A 2014 FOREST RIVER ROCKWOOD FIFTH WHEEL TRAILER. THE VEHICLE WAS EQUIPPED WITH ROCKWOOD (NA) TIRE SIZE 225/75/R15. THE CONTACT STATED THAT WHILE DRIVING APPROXIMATELY 55 MPH, HE NOTICED THAT THE TWO PASSENGER'S SIDE FRONT TIRES AND THE REAR TIRE HAD DISINTEGRATED. THE CONTACT ADDED AIR TO THE TIRES AND TOOK THE VEHICLE TO THE DEALER. THE DEFECTIVE TIRE WAS REPLACED WITH A SPARE. THE MANUFACTURER ALSO PROVIDED THE CONTACT WITH A NEW TIRE. THE CONTACT HAD NOT YET INSTALLED THE NEW TIRE. THE MANUFACTURER WAS MADE AWARE OF THE PROBLEM. THE FAILURE MILEAGE WAS UNAVAILABLE.
